memorysystem.title: Memory Map for Top_Level
memorysystem.description: The project contains the following subsystems:

field.name: Prescale
field.description: Determines effective clock rate for counter relative to PCLK

field.name: TimerIntClr
field.description: Any write to this location will clear the interrupt

field.name: RawTimerInterrupt
field.description: Raw timer interrupt status, active high
